Barbara's group is comprised of four hard-working women. Barbara is 20 years old and lives in the town of Natete in the Kampala North region of Uganda. For the past two years, she has been working hard to manage her food stall, which sells snacks and other kinds of food. 

To help expand her business, Barbara has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more food for resale and will help Barbara generate greater profits and pay school fees for her brother. Barbara hopes that in the future she will be able to open her own hair salon. 

Barbara is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Barbara's future prospects by helping her to invest in her family's education.

loans.use: to purchase more food for resale,

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a determined businessman aged 25. He is married and blessed with one child. For the last three years, he has been selling fish to make a living. He has grown his business with his previous loans from Faulu Kenya. In the next five years, he wants to become the supplier of fish in his region. He is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy fish.

loans.use: To buy fish.

loans.name: Yuniya's Group

texts.en:
Yuniya's group is comprised of 5 hard-working women. Yuniya is 21 years old and lives in the town of Nateete in the Kampala North region of Uganda. She is married and has two children who are both currently in school. For the past three years, Yuniya has been working hard to help her mother manage a small shop which sells shoes and other footwear. 

To help expand her business, Yuniya has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more shoes and will help Yuniya to generate greater profits and pay school fees. Yuniya hopes that in the future she will be able to open her own retail business. 

Yuniya is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Yuniya's future prospects by helping her to learn more about running a business.

loans.use: to buy more shoes.

loans.name: Agneta

texts.en:
Agneta has been fishing in Naivasha town at Lake Naivasha for the last six years.  She sells all the fish at the local market in Naivasha town.  She is 48 years old, married to Joseph, and they have two children.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her third loan.  She repaid both her previous loans well and in good time.  She plans to use the loan amount to buy a new fishing boat.

In future, Agneta hopes to open up a fish processing company.

loans.use: To buy a fishing boat.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is a businessman aged 23; he is married and blessed with one child. For the last two years, he has been managing a cafeteria to make a living. He has boosted his business with his previous loan from Faulu Kenya.  In the next five years, he wants to buy a plot of land. He is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy ingredients such as sugar and cooking fat.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as sugar and cooking fat.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fish, vegetables, and detergent products to sell.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi has been buying and selling fish in Naivasha town for the last 10 years.  She is 35 years old, married to Kennedy, and they have two children.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan.  She plans to use the loan amount to buy more fish to sell.

In future, Naomi hopes to grow her business and become a leading supplier of fish and fish products in Naivasha town.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a married man with one child who is still too young for school. He lives at a rental house that has electricity and piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and rental bills.

For the past year, he has operated a motorcycle business; his potential customers are neighbours and passersby. He faces a major challenge of competition from other motorcycle operators and the high cost of purchasing fuel. Hamisi dreams of expanding his business in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000 he wants to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle. He decided to work with Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his motorcycle.

loans.name: Ruth's Group

texts.en:
Ruth's group is comprised of two hard-working women. Ruth is 21 years old and lives in the town of Nateete in the Kampala North region of Uganda. She is married and has three children who are all currently in school. For the past two years, Ruth has been working hard to manage her small shop, which sells clothes. 

To help expand her business, Ruth has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes to stock for her business, and it will help Ruth to generate greater profits and pay schools fees. Ruth hopes that in the future she will be able to open her own boutique shop. 

Ruth is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Ruth's future prospects by helping her to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to stock for her business.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last five years.  She is 57 years old, married to Isaac, and they have five children.  

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her third loan.  She repaid both her previous loans well and in good time.  She plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In future, Miriam hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is a businesswoman aged 27. She is married and blessed with four children. For the last two years, she has been managing a business selling charcoal to earn a living. She has grown her business since she joined Faulu Kenya.  In the next five years, she wants to expand her business. She is requesting a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy charcoal.

loans.use: To buy charcoal.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane has practiced dairy farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last three years.  She also sells milk and milk products like powdered milk.  She is 32 years old and a single mother of two school-going children.  

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan.  She plans to use the loan amount to buy a dairy cow.

In future, Jane hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Agnes' Group

texts.en:
Agnes’s group is comprised of six hard-working women. Agnes is 18 years old and lives in the town of Nateete in the Kampala North region of Uganda. For the past two years, she has been working hard to manage her small restaurant, which delivers hot meals to local families and businesses. 

To help expand her business, Agnes has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy cooking oil and food warmers and will help Agness to generate greater profits and pay her school fees. Agnes hopes that in the future she will be able to become an engineer. 

Agnes is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Agnes's future prospects by helping her to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil and food warmers.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 10 years. She is 36 years old, married to Kanyora, and they have four school-going children. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer. In future, Cecilia hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en: Mejumaa is a married woman with four children; three attend school while one is still young. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. For the past ten years, Mejumaa has operated a tailoring business, selling in a shop to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other tailors in the area. Mejumaa dreams of expanding her business in the future. With the Kshs 30,000 she wants to repair her tailoring machine, purchase cloth materials and sewing threads. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To repair her tailoring machine, purchase cloth materials and sewing threads.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 33 years. She is 63 years old, married to Erastus and they have six school-going children. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her third loan. Esther repaid her previous loans well and in good time. She plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer. In future, Esther hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Irene

texts.en: Irene is 34 years old, married with two children. She runs a hardware shop to earn a living. She has been operating the business for five years. She has benefited from the business trainings conducted by Faulu Kenya. This has helped her to improve her business. Irene hopes to open other outlets of her business. She has requested 50, 000 Kenya shillings to buy paint and nails.

loans.use: To buy nails and paint

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy food items, fabrics, mobile phones, and agri-food for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last seven years. She is 43 years old, married to James and they have two school-going children.  

Monicah was introduced to KADET LTD. by one of our field officers and this will be her fourth loan. She has repaid all her previous loans well and in good time. She plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In future, Monicah hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 39-year-old business man. He runs a grocery shop to earn a living. He has been operating the business for over five years. He has used his previous loans from Faulu Kenya to boost his business. His desire is to expand his business into wholesale in the future.

Joseph dreams of opening other outlets of his business in the future. He has requested a loan for 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy potatoes, tomatoes and onions.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes and onions.

loans.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice is 41 years old, single, and a mother of two children (20 and 10 years of age). She runs a beauty salon and she has been in business for 11 years. Currently, her monthly income from the business is KES 20,000.

Loice is borrowing a loan of KES 70,000, with which she plans to purchase salon equipment and materials for hair dressing. She plans to open another salon business in Eldoret town with the anticipated profits from the business.

This is her fifth loan and she has successfully repaid her previous loans. Her hopes and dreams are to continue with her salon business, to buy a matatu (private minibus) for public transportation and to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy salon equipment and materials for hair dressing.

loans.name: Maisha Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kakule, leader du groupe d’affaire «Maisha », est  jeune entrepreneur, âgée de 34  ans, mariée, mère de 3 jeunes enfants, qui étudient tous à l’école primaire. Son mari est un enseignant. Elle est  sociétaire d’une pharmacie. Elle s’installe dans une officine commerciale. Il y a 13 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  8 cycles avec le crédit de Hekima. Son premier capital fut 300$ reçu d’un décompte de son mari, lors que ce dernier travaillait dans un organisme international. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  5 cartons de médicaments essentiels et génériques à  marchander.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir confortablement  et agrandir son entreprise.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en: Our client Kakule, leader of the «Maisha » group, is a young entrpreneur, 34 years of age, married and the mother of three young children, all of whom go to primary school. Her husband is a teacher. She is a partner in a pharmacy. She has her shop set up in a commercial building. She has been doing this work to earn a bit of extra income for 13 years already. She just completed eight loan cycles with Hekima. Her starting capital of $300 was received from her husband, when he used to work for an international organization. This new loan will allow her to renew her stock by buying five boxes of common generic mediations for resale. In addition, she would like her children to grow up in comfort and to expand her business. This client thanks Hekima for its work in support of impoverished women who do not have access to traditional banking.

loans.use: to buy five boxes of common generic medications

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Nelson Ovidio

texts.es:
Nelson, se dedica a sastrería, elabora forro de vehículos y buses, para muebles de sala, él vive con su esposa y su hijo de 6 años, trabaja todos los días ya que este trabajo es rentable de lunes a domingo.
El necesita el crédito para comprar una maquina industrial, el cual le ayudara aumentar sus ingresos y a mejorar el trabajo.
El sueño de Nelson es que su familia este más estable económicamente, y comprar un lote para hacer su casa.
texts.en:
Nelson works in tailoring, making covers for vehicles and buses and for living room furniture.  He lives with is wife and 6 year old son.  He works every day, Monday through Sunday, as this work is very profitable.

He needs the loan to purchase an industrial sewing-machine, which will help him to increase his income and improve his work.

Nelson's dream is that his family becomes more stable financially, and that he can buy a lot where he can build a home.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing-machine.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph has been practicing farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the past four years. He is 47 years old, married to Jane, and they have six school-going children. He was introduced to KADET by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. Joseph plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In the future, Joseph hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Abahetsi Group

texts.fr:
Jeanne fait partie du groupe Abahetsi. Le nom du groupe signifie « transporteurs ». Elle est née au Rwanda et elle a 27 ans. Elle est mariée avec 2 enfants de 3 et 5 ans, tous les deux scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Jeanne est cultivatrice de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire la semence du riz sélectionné. Dans les prochaines années, Jeanne voudrait récolter une grande quantité de riz. Avec les profits, elle prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jeanne is a member of the Abahetsi group. The group's name means "carriers". Jeanne is 27 years old and she was born in Rwanda. She is married with two children aged 3 and 5, both in school. Jeanne herself attended primary school for six years. 

Jeanne is a rice farmer. This is her first loan cycle with ACB, and she plans to use the funding to buy fertilizers.

Her business growth strategy revolves around the selected rice seed. In the coming years, Jeanne hopes to produce a large crop of rice and use the profits to provide for her children’s education and healthcare.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her rice farming business

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosa Maria; tiene 41 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos de 23, 20, 16 años de edad, la socia tiene una tienda abarrotes  en sus propia casa, es aquí también donde se reúnen los miembros de banco comunal, la socia vende todo lo relacionado a productos de abarrotes y también cervezas, gaseosas, vinos. La socia desea poder invertir el nuevo crédito en la compra de mercadería de abarrotes, ella comprara arroz, al por mayor, azúcar, fideos, harinas, leche, embutidos, pañales, y otros, la socia es una de las pocas que abastece al poblado, hace unos meses atrás con el derrumbe que sufrieron ellos se quedaron 3 días desabastecidos de productos, por esta razón la socia ahora que comenzaran las lluvias desea poder abastecer a la comunidad, para ello implementara su tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de abarrotes como fideos, arroz, azúcar, harinas, leche y otros.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Rosa Maria is a member of the "Las Flores de Yanacona" community bank which is located 10 minutes from Yanacona, Urubamba, in Cusco department.

Rosa Maria is 41 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children aged 23, 20 and 16.  She has a grocery store in her own home and this is where the members of her community bank meet.  She sells groceries and also beer, soda and wine.  Rosa Maria would like to be able to invest her new loan in buying groceries.  She will buy rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk, canned goods, diapers, etc. wholesale.  She is one of the few people who supplies her town.  Some months ago, following the landslide that they suffered, they spent three days without products.  For this reason, now that the rains are about to start, Rosa Maria would like to be able to supply her community by stocking her grocery store.

Rosa Maria is requesting this loan to invest in buying groceries such as noodles, rice, sugar, flour, milk, etc.  She is grateful for the loan she is being given and values it.  She pledges to continue making her monthly repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying groceries such as noodles, rice, sugar, flour, milk, etc.

loans.name: Reuben

texts.en:
Reuben, 22 years old, is a single and hard working man. He has practiced livestock farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last two years. He was introduced to KADET LTD. by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. He plans to use the loan amount to buy sheep, which he will sell later.

In the future, Reuben hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: to buy sheep, which he will rear and sell later.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a circular saw and timber.

loans.name: Marcia Berónica

texts.es:
Marcia es una mujer de 44 años, casada y madre de 2 hijos que actualmente están estudiando que tienen 10 y 13 años de edad. Vive con su familia en la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas" en una parroquia de la capital llamada "Río Toachi", ubicada en el perímetro urbano. Su esposo Gonzalo es supervisor en una empresa de servicio de agua y alcantarillado público desde hace 13 años.

Desde hace 4 años ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso cosmético y uso personal. Esta actividad la empezó por motivación propia para así poder aportar económicamente a su hogar. Este mes existe una liquidación de productos por lo que Marcia desea invertir en esta oportunidad, de esta manera, si los productos los consigue a menor precio ella podrá obtener más ganancias. Es su primer crédito en el sector financiero y es que Marcia está convencida de que esto le ayudará a tener mayor ingreso para su familia.

Marcia nos cuenta que lo más complicado del negocio es convencer al cliente, es por esto que ella diariamente trata de mejorar su manera de expresarse. Trabaja las horas que sean necesarias para poder lograr sus ventas ya que su meta es tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marcia is a 44-year-old woman.  She is married and has two children, aged 10 and 13, who are currently in school.  She lives with her family in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province, in a parish in the capital called Río Toachi which is located on the outskirts of the city.  Her husband, Gonzalo, is a foreman in a company that provides water and public sewerage services.  He has worked there for 13 years.

For four years, Marcia has been selling cosmetics and personal care products.  She started this business through her own motivation so that she could contribute financially to her household.  This month there is a closeout and Marcia would like to invest in this opportunity.  If she can obtain products at a lower price, she will be able to make more profits.  This is her first loan from the financial sector and Marcia is convinced that it will help her to make more income for her family.

Marcia tells us that the most complicated part of her business is convincing her customers to buy.  This is why she tries every day to improve how she expresses herself.  She works the hours that she needs to in order to be able to make her sales.  Her goal is to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a batch of items that are on offer

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Elsa; tiene 28 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos de 9, 5, 1 años de edad, La socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, para  la venta la socia cría chanchos, ovejas, gallinas, cuyes para criar, reproducirlos y venderlos, la socia desea invertir este crédito en la copra de chanchos, ovejas y gallinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores en esta ocasión comprara chanchos 2, ovejas, 4 y gallinas, 6.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This member belongs to Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank, which is located 10 minutes from the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

Elsa is 28 years old, lives with her partner and has 3 children ages 9, 5 and 1 year old. She raises small animals such as pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs to reproduce and sell them. She wants to use this loan to purchase pigs, sheep and chickens, specifically 2 pigs, 4 sheep and 6 chickens.

She is grateful for and appreciates the loan provided and is committed to continue making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase small animals, specifically 2 pigs, 4 sheep and 6 chickens.

loans.name: Coumba

texts.fr: commercante au marché central de thiès une ville qui se trouve a proximité de la capital du Sénégal. Elle s'active depuis plus de 2 ans dans l'achat et la revente des tissus et basins riches .Ce prêt lui permettra de rendre sa porte feuille plus active dans ce domaine ou elle tend a faire des efforts pour l'achat de marchandises dans le bon fonctionnement de son commerce. Avec une appuie purement financiere cette commercante peut mener a bien ses activités et d'avoir des profits pour la réalisation de l'ouverture de sa cantine afin de ne plus louer pour stocker ses marchandises.
texts.en: This woman is a merchant at the central market in Thiès, a city close to the capital of Senegal. For over two years, she has been involved in buying and re-selling fabric and damask of the "riche" type. This loan will allow her to diversify her portfolio in this field, in which she has made efforts to extend her purchase of goods in order to run her business well. With financial support alone, this merchant will be able to run her business well and earn a profit in order to realize her ambition of opening her own store and thus avoiding the need to rent a place to stock her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy fabric and damask for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy fish, fabric, jewelry, sheets, and perfume for resale.

loans.name: Haidee

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Hayde; tiene 32 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 7 años de edad, La socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, para  la venta la socia cría gallinas y las vende, ella cría pollos, de doble pechuga y luego cuando crecer los lleva  a vender al mercado en Urubamba al por mayor, la socia trabaja comprando y vendiendo pollos, gallinas, gallos, la socia  se dedica a  la comercio de gallinas, en esta ocasión la socia desea poder comprar 40 aves para criarlas y reproducirla, y luego d esto venderlas en el mercado y ferias. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de aves de corral pollos y gallinas, para la venta.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Hayde is a member of the "Las Flores de Yanacona" community bank which is located 10 minutes from Yanacona, Urubamba, in Cusco department.

Hayde is 32 years old, married, and has two children aged 17 and 7.  Her business is raising animals.  She raises hens and "double-breasted chickens".  When they have grown, she sells them in the market in Urubamba wholesale.  She works buying and selling chickens, hens and roosters.  On this occasion, Hayde would like to buy 40 birds to raise and breed, then sell in the market and street markets.  She is requesting this loan to buy farmyard birds (chickens and hens) to sell.

Hayde is grateful for the loan that she is receiving and values it.  She pledges to continue making her monthly loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying farmyard birds (chickens and hens) to sell

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Nicolasa; tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos de22, 18, 16 años de edad, La socia se dedica  a la atención de su tienda de abarrotes, la socia tiene sus propia tienda en la cual vende arroz, fideos, leche enlatados, aceite entre otros, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de productos de abarrotes,  como arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, mazamorras, y otros productos, como huevos y galletas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en al compra de productos de abarrotes para la venta.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This member belongs to Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank, which is located 10 minutes from the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

Nicolasa is 42 years old, married and has 3 children, ages 22, 18 and 16. She owns and runs a grocery store, where she sells rice, noodles, canned milk and oil, among other items. She will use her loan to purchase merchandise like rice, sugar, noodles, milk, boiled corn and other items, such as eggs and cookies. She will purchase these products and then sell them.

She is grateful for and appreciates the loan provided and is committed to continue making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase grocery merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Yaneth Dora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Yanet; tiene 23 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 3 años de edad, La socia se dedica  a la  crianza de animales menores, para  la venta la socia cría gallinas y pollos, ella en especial cría pollos al por mayor, la socia los lleva  a vender los sábados y domingos en el mercado en Urubamba, la socia tiene 200 pollos los cuales ya tiene un comprador y ella requiere el crédito para comprar comida, la socia también les comprar vitaminas, una ves que ella entregue le pagaran en dos partes, por lo cual ella requiere el préstamo y también para comprar 200 pollos mas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de alimento y vitaminas para los pollos y comprar 200 pollos.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Yanet, 23, is a member of the “Las Flores de Yanacona” communal bank located ten minutes from the town of Urubamba belonging to Cusco Department.

She has a spouse and two children who are 6 and 3 years of age.  She raises small farm animals to sell.  She raises chickens and chicks.  She specializes in raising chickens at wholesale.  She takes them to sell at the Urubamba market on Saturdays and Sundays.  She has 200 chicks that she already has a buyer for and she needs the loan to buy feed; she also wants to buy vitamins.  Once she delivers them, she’ll be paid in two parts so she needs the loan to also buy 200 more chicks.  She requests the loan to invest in the purchase of feed and vitamins for the chicks and to buy 200 chicks.

She is grateful for and values the loan granted and commits to continue to make her monthly installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for the chickens and to buy 200 chicks.

loans.name: Abadahemuka/kzr Group

texts.fr:
Theophile fait partie du groupe Abadehemuka et sur la photo est le monsieur qui a de l'argent. Le nom du groupe signifie « les fideles ». Il a 45 ans. Il est marié avec 6 enfants de 2 à 15 ans, dont 5 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Theophile est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Dans les prochaines années, Theophile voudrait être le meilleur agriculteur dans sa vallée. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Theophile belongs to the Abadehemuka group and is the man holding the money in the photo. The name of the group means "the faithful." He is 45 years old, married, and has six children between the ages of 2 and 15, of whom five are in school. His own level of education includes six years of primary school.

Theophile is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He is going to use is loan to buy chemical fertilizers for growing rice.

In the coming years, Theophile would like to be the best farmer in his valley. With his profits, he intends to educate and take care of his children.

loans.use: To buy chemical fertilizers for growing rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cheese, and chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy fish, vegetables, and clothing for resale.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.es: El señor Oliver, trabaja en una consultora de auditoria como asistente de oficina y también vende ropa. El crédito lo requiere para el aumento de capital de trabajo y comprar más ropa, como ser: chamarras y deportivos. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de san pedro en la ciudad de La Paz, es divorciado y tiene un  hijo. Oliver es cliente nuestro desde el año  2009 y esta es la primera vez que su crédito será canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Oliver works as an office assistant for an accounting firm and he also sells clothes.  He needs the loan to increase working capital and buy more clothes like: jackets and sportswear.  He lives in his parents’ house which is located in the city of La Paz’s San Pedro zone.  He’s divorced and has a son.  Oliver has been our client since 2009 and this is the first time his loan will be channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy jackets and sportswear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fabric in order to make clothing.

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Martha; tiene 56 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos los cuales todos ellos son independientes;  La socia se dedica  a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, la socia cría cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, y los engorda y vende, la socia lleva  a vender sus animales menores al mercado de Urubamba, la socia ahora desea el crédito para comprar gallinas 20 y cuyes 50, la socia invertirá en la compra de estos animales menores y los criara, engordara y espera que se reproduzcan antes de venderlos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de gallinas y cuyes. 
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Martha, 56, is a member of the “Las Flores de Yanacona” communal bank located ten minutes from the town of Urubamba belonging to Cusco Department.

She is married and has four children who are all independent.  She’s a farmer and also raises small farm animals.  She raises guinea pigs, chickens and pigs that she fattens up and then sells.  She sells her small farm animals at the Urubamba market.  She wants the loan to buy 20 chicks and 50 guinea pigs.  She will invest in the purchase of these small animals and she’ll raise them, fatten them up and hopes that they’ll breed before she sells them.  She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of chickens and guinea pigs.

She is grateful for and values the loan granted and commits to continue to make her monthly installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy herbicides for infestations, and manure.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.es: La señora  Olivia, se dedica a la producción de leche y también trabaja realizando artesanías pues es tejedora de mantas. El crédito lo requiere para la comprar  un par de vacas lecheras y así podrá aumentar la producción de leche y obviamente sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicado en la localidad de Achacachi  del departamento de La Paz;  es soltera  y no tiene hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su crédito será enviado a Kiva para fondeo.
texts.en: Olivia is a dairy farmer and also works making crafts since she’s a blanket weaver.  She needs the loan to buy a pair of dairy cows to increase milk production and, obviously, her income.  She lives in her own house located in Achacachi in La Paz Department.  She’s single and has no children.  This is the second time her loan will be sent to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to buy a pair of daily cows.

loans.name: Adriel

texts.es: Adriel, de 63 años, es un hombre muy alegre y responsable, él convive con su pareja con quien tiene siete hijos mayores, quienes ya son adultos e independientes. Juntos habitan en la casa que heredó de sus padres, acompañadps de sus hermanos. El trabajo de Adriel, es el de servicio de vulcanizado a las mototaxis y motos que a diario van en busca que les de solución los problemas de su llanta. Por otro lado tiene una pequeña tienda de venta respetos de vehículos. Ambos negocios se encuentran instalados en un espacio de su casa, y tiene 20 años ejecutando haciendo lo mismo y con ello logró educar y alimentar a sus hijos, y dos de ellos con este mismo trabajo pero en distintos lugares. La ventaja que tiene su negocio es que su taller se encuentra en un calle muy concurrida de la ciudad. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, y espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar trabajando en su taller. Con el monto solicitado, comprará repuestos para la venta de algunos materiales y repuestos para implementar su taller.
texts.en:
Adriel, 63, is a very cheerful, responsible man.   He lives with his spouse and has six older children who are all adults and independent.  They live together in a house he inherited from his parents with his siblings. 

Ariel’s work is repairing mototaxi and motorcycle tires for customers who daily come by seeking solutions to their tire related problems.  On the other hand, he also has a small vehicle spare parts store.  Both businesses are located in a space in his house.  He has been doing the same thing for 20 years and he managed to educate and feed his children through it; two of them have the same kind of business but in other parts of town.  The advantage that his shop has is that it’s located on a very busy street in the city.

This will be his first MFP loan and he hopes to get support from each one of you to stay in business in his shop.  He will use the requested amount to by replacement parts to sell and some materials and spare parts to stock his workshop.

loans.use: to buy materials and spare parts.

loans.name: Abesamihigo B Group

texts.fr:
Athanase fait partie du groupe Abesamihigo B. Le nom du groupe signifie « performers ». Il a 51 ans. Il est marié avec 8 enfants de 6 à 26 ans, dont 4 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Athanase est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Dans les prochaines années, Athanase voudrait être le meilleur agriculteur dans sa vallée. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer ses enfants et payer la mutuelle de santé.
texts.en: Athanase is part of the Abesamihigo B group. The name of the group means "performers". Athanase is 51 years old, married and has 8 children aged between 6 and 26 years, 4 of whom go to school. Athanase himself completed 6 years of primary school and is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB and he will use the money to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm. In the coming years, Athanase would like to become the best farmer in his valley. He plans to use his profits to pay his children's educational expenses and his family's health insurance.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm.

loans.name: Patricio

texts.es: El señor Patricio es chofer y tiene dos taxis, pero el está a cargo de uno y para el otro contrata un chofer auxiliar. El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de las movilidades y comprar una batería para el vehiculo que maneja el chofer contratado. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Villa Ingenio de la ciudad de El Alto; Patricio  es casado y tiene tres hijos. Patricio ya solicitó dos créditos anteriores a través de Kiva y está será la tercera vez.
texts.en:
Sr. Patricio is a taxi driver and owns two vehicles. He drives one taxi while the other one is driven by a hired assistant. The loan he is requesting will be used for the maintenance of both vehicles and the purchase of a battery for his assistant’s taxi. Patricio lives in his own home in the District of Villa Ingenio in the city of El Alto. He is married and has three children.

Patricio has already requested two previous loans through Kiva and this will be his third one.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of two taxis and to buy a battery for one of them.

loans.name: Aleida

texts.es: Aleida tiene 33 años, es una mujer alegre, dinámica y emprendedora, esta casada y tiene dos hijos de 10 y 7 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, acompañada también de su suegro, motivo por el cual ella y su esposo se esfuerzan cada día para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Aleida consiste en la venta de ropa, zapatos y productos para el hogar por medio de catálogo. Aleida posee un loca en la casa de su madre, ahí comparte el local junto a su hermana que se dedica a otro negocio, es así que lleva trabajando por más de seis años y lo hace sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene disponibilidad para muchas otras actividades además de tener contacto directo con la gente, pues ella es muy sociable, y le encanta ofrecer los artículos y accesorios de moda, así como la prendas de vestir de temporada, logrando captar más clientela. Su mayor anhleo es tener una boutique, pero para ello necesitará invertir y crecer su negocio. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ropa, zapatos y algunos accesorios para abastecer su pequeño negocio.
texts.en: Aleida is 33 years old. She is a cheerful, dynamic and enterprising woman. She is married and has two childrem aged 10 and 7. Together they live in their own home with her father in law. Her husband and her work hard every day to offer them a good quality of life. Aleida's job consists of selling clothes, shoes and products for the home via catalogue. She has a locale in her mother's house. She shares the locale with her sister who has another business. She has been doing this work for more than six years and she works alone. What she likes the most about her job is she is available to do many other activities and she has direct contact with people. She is very sociable and she likes to offer fashion items and accessories as well as seasonal clothing, in order to gain more customers. Her greatest wish is to have a boutique store, but she will need to invest and make her business grow. This will be her third loan with MFP and she hopes to have your support to keep on working. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy clothes, shoes and some accessories for inventory for her small business.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes and accessories.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es: El sr. Samuel nacido en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Ahora vive en una localidad  a 32km de el Torno al en la comunidad de las Liras, su esposa la Sra. Cristina es ama de casa, tienen dos hijos, ellos viven y  trabajan en su misma parcela, ellos se dedican a la agricultura, siembran arroz, maíz y también se dedican a sacar madera para los carpinteros,  solicitaron un crédito para la compra de una motocicleta, por motivo que no hay transporte hasta su parcela y esto le dificulta al Sr. Samuel movilizarse a distintos lugares, por este motivo solicito el crédito ya que una motocicleta le será de mucha utilidad, los productos que siembran lo comercializan en el mercados de el Torno directamente del productor al consumidor, donde les va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, es una persona trabajadora con muchas ganas de seguir adelante, agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Samuel was born in the city of Santa Cruz de la Sierra.  Now he lives 32 kilometers from el Torno in the community of Las Liras.  His wife Cristina is a homemaker and they have two children, who live and work on the same plot of land.  They work in agriculture, planting rice and corn and they also cut wood for the carpenters.  They requested this loan in order to purchase a motorcycle, since there isn't transportation to his property and this makes it difficult for Samuel to travel to different places.  For this reason, he requested the loan since a motorcycle would be very useful to him.  He sells the produce that they plant in the markets of el Torno, directly from producer to consumer, where it is going well since he has many customers.  He is a hardworking person with a great desire to succeed and grateful to the institution for the support being offered.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: El señor Jesús, es comerciante de  cabezas de llamas y también es maestro curandero, es decir que cura a la gente usando hierbas medicinales. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de más llamas, para luego vender su carne y las cabezas a los mercados donde se cocinan y se hacen comidas con carne de llama, que por ciento es muy apetecida y más saludable que la carne de res. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri  en la ciudad de La Paz, es viudo  y tiene cinco   hijos. Jesús es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2008 y esta será la segunda vez que su solicitud de crédito sea canalizada a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Jesús sells llama heads and is also a master practitioner of folk medicine. He says that he can cure people through the use of medicinal herbs. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more llamas so that he can eventually sell the meat and the heads at the markets where dishes using these ingredients are prepared. Llama meat is known for being more appealing and healthier than beef. Jesús lives in his own home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. He is a widower and has five children.

Jesús has been a client of IMPRO since 2008. This is the second time that his loan request has been referred to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to purchase llamas to raise and for eventual resale.

loans.name: Angel María

texts.es:
Ángel es un microempresario padre de 5 hijos que vive en la provincia ecuatoriana de "Chimborazo" en una parroquia de la capital de esta provincia que se llamada "Eloy Alfaro". Este sector es conocido por sus deliciosos helados llamados "helados de Salcedo". Este ecuatoriano fue presidente del barrio donde reside con su familia y gracias a su gestión se realizaron obras importantes para el bienestar de varias familias.

Desde hace 12 años Ángel fabrica y vende helados en este sector. Al principio fue difícil por la falta de dinero emprender su propio negocio pero hoy en día todos lo conocen por vender un producto de calidad. Durante los primeros meses de su negocio el únicamente comercializaba los helados pero luego se arriesgó a fabricarlos. Él quiere pagar su carro, el cual le ayuda a distribuir sus helados y así vender más como nos comenta. Es su primer crédito con Fundación Alternativa y se espera que Ángel cumpla sus metas.
texts.en:
Ángel is a micro-entrepreneur and the father of five children. He lives in the parish of Eloy Alfaro, which is the capital of Chimborazo Province. This area is known for its delicious ice cream treats called “helados de Salcedo”, which are named after an Ecuadorian who served as the president of the neighborhood where Ángel resides with his family. The Salcedo administration engaged in important work that promoted the welfare of many families.

Ángel has been making and selling ice cream in this area for 12 years. His difficulty at first was the lack of money to start his business, but today everyone knows him because he sells a quality product. During the first few months of his business, he only sold ice cream but he eventually started making it himself. Ángel says he wants to pay the costs of his car since it helps him distribute his ice cream so that he can sell more. This is his first loan with Fundación Alternativa and he hopes to accomplish his goals.

loans.use: to pay the cost of maintaining the car he uses for distributing ice cream.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: El Sr. Evaristo es cliente de la institución que desde muy joven, radica en Santa Cruz, es oriundo de la ciudad de La Paz, se vino ha trabajar a Santa Cruz buscando un futuro mejor y mejores condiciones de vida, empezó comercializando bolsas de plásticos, seguidamente comercializo abarrotes. Fundo una asociación  en uno de los mercados mas populares de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, donde comercializa ropa interior desde hace 18 años. El cliente menciona que se encuentra satisfecho por los logros obtenidos.  La familia la componen 4 hijos y su esposa, los hijos actualmente estudian. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de mercadería, ropa interior por mayor, es una persona muy amable y cordial con sus clientes, se encuentra agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Evaristo has been a client of Emprender since he moved to Santa Cruz as a young man.  He is originally from the city of La Paz, but came to work in Santa Cruz so that he could find a better life and improved living conditions.  Evaristo started out selling plastic bags and then transitioned to selling groceries.  He started an association at one of the most popular markets in Santa Cruz, where he has been selling undergarments for 18 years.  Evaristo says that he is satisfied with what he has achieved.  His family consists of his wife and four children who are currently in school.  

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more merchandise, particularly undergarments in bulk.  He is a person who is friendly and cordial with his customers.  Evaristo is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to purchase undergarments in bulk.

loans.name: Samba

texts.fr: Monsieur Samba  habite au Sénégal. Il est marié et père de 5 enfants dont l’âge varie entre  4 mois et 14 ans. Il évolue depuis plus de 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce et s’adonne à la vente de denrées alimentaires et produits agro-alimentaires. Il a choisi son activité par amour  en aidant son oncle qui évoluait dans ce domaine. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis octobre 2010. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de denrées alimentaires destinés a renforcer  son stock de produits , d’élargir son activité, d’accroitre ses bénéfices, et de satisfaire ses besoins familiaux.
texts.en: Samba lives in Senegal. He is married and the father of 5 children aged between 4 months and 14 years. He has been active in the retail sector for over a decade and sells staple and agricultural food products. He loves his line of work, which he chose after helping his uncle with his retailing activities. He has been a member of a UIMCEC branch since October 2010. He is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs so that he can restock on food products, expand his business activities and increase his profits, which he plans to use to satisfy his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale.

loans.name: Dufatanye Duterimbere / Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Jean fait partie du groupe Dufatanye Duterimbere / RSZ. Le nom du groupe signifie « travailler ensemble pour le développement ». Il est né au Rwanda et il a 49 ans. Il est marié avec 6 enfants de 9 à 24 ans, dont 6 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Jean est cultivateur de riz. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de cultiver à temps pour avoir une bonne récolte. Dans les prochaines années, Jean voudrait être le meilleur agriculteur de  riz dans sa vallée. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jean is part of the Dufatanye Duterimbere / RSZ group. The name of the group means "working together for development". Jean was born in Rwanda and is 49 years old. He is married and has 6 children aged between 9 and 24 years, all of whom go to school. He himself completed 6 years of primary school.
Jean is a rice farmer. This is his second loan cycle with ACB and he will use the money to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm. He plans to grow his business by using seasonal farming techniques to ensure a good harvest. In the coming years, Jean would like to become the best rice farmer is his valley, and he plans to use his profits to educate and take care of his children.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm.

loans.name: Moises Tony

texts.es: El señor Moisés oriundo de Pocitos-Tarija, tiene tres hijos, su esposa falleció hace tres meses, este fue un golpe para el comenta el Sr. ya que se siente muy solo y sin ayuda ya que ella era la que se encargaba del cuidado de sus hijos, pero por ellos el Sr. sigue adelante luchando,  Su domicilio es propio  que se encuentra ubicado en barrio lindo (municipio la guardia),  es de ocupación taxista, trabaja con los trufis de la ramada y  urbanización Arco iris, hace unos dos años que se dedica a esta actividad. Es cliente antiguo. El destino del crédito es para el mantenimiento de su vehículo necesita reparar su motor de su auto, ya que este desperfecto en su movilidad no le permite realizar un buen trabajo. Se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Moisés is a native of Pocitos-Tarija and has three children. His wife died three months ago. Moisés says that this was a devastating blow for him because he feels alone and helpless. His wife was responsible for taking care of the children, but he is determined to press forward for their sake. He owns a home in the neighborhood of Lindo in the town of La Guardia. Moisés is a taxi driver and works an assigned route from La Ramada to the urban development of Arco Iris. He has been in this profession for about two years.

Moisés is a long-time client. This loan will be used to maintain his vehicle since the engine needs to be repaired. This defect with his vehicle is not allowing him to perform a good job. He is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Buen Corazon Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BUEN CORAZÓN” iniciará su quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por trece integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Virginia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Comercio, venta de ropa, servicios de comida y producción. 

La señora Virginia  indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer  por invitación de la promoción y de sus vecinas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de ropa que viene trabajando desde hace diez años, el mismo lo aprendió de su suegra y de su cuñada.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su mercadería (compra de ropa), que adquirirá de Oruro o de la Huyustus y lo comercializa en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Buen Corazón” (Good Heart) is starting its fifth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Exaltación Center. The group consists of 13 members and is led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Virginia. The members of the Communal Bank engage in various businesses to get ahead such as trade, clothing sales, food services, and manufacturing.

Sra. Virginia says that she joined Pro Mujer two years ago after receiving an invitation to attend a promotion from her neighbors. She currently has a business selling clothes and has worked for 10 years. She learned this trade from her mother-in-law and sister-in-law.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her inventory of merchandise (by purchasing clothes). She acquires her goods from Oruro or La Huyustus and then sells them at the fairs. Working in this manner makes it possible for her to generate income to support her family. Virginia is in a common-law relationship and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Virginia said that she enjoys the meetings.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Aura Lila

texts.es:
Doña Aura es de profesion costurera, con mas de treinta años, laborando para el bienestar comun de su familia, es de condicion sencilla y poco a poco ha venido haciendo mejora a su casa.
Cuenta con la ayuda economica de sus hijos, lo que para ella es de gran sastifaccion. Los prestamos en Afodenic, han sido para las mejora a su vivienda con el credito anterior logro hacer un cuarto en la parte de atrás de concreto y madera.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento mejorara la cocina que esta en muy mal estado ya que las tablas estan bastante vieja, lo que levantara desde el aranque para que quede buena,comprara materiales en tabla de madera, clavos, cuartones y otros, logrando estar en mejores condiciones de vivienda.
texts.en:
Doña Aura is a seamstress by profession. She has been working for more than 30 years in order to provide for the common welfare of her family. Her living conditions are simple, but slowly she has been making improvements to her home.

Aura has the financial assistance of her children, which gives her great satisfaction. The loans from AFODENIC have been used for home improvements. With her previous loan, she was able to add a room at the back of her house by purchasing concrete and wood.

Today she will use her new loan to make improvements to her kitchen, which is in very bad shape. The floorboards are quite old and need to be pulled up in order to start from scratch. Aura will buy materials such as wooden planks, nails, lumber, and other supplies so that she can improve the condition of her home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for making improvements to her kitchen.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Ana Maria; tiene 58 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 2 hijos de 23, 14 años de edad;  La socia se dedica  a la agricultura, la socia y vende lo que produce,  la socia vende en el mercado de Urubamba verduras, ella lleva  a vender los días sábados y domingos, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas, la socia también requiere contrata un tractos y preparar el terreno para la nueva siembra, la socia invertirá también en la compra de abono para luego ponga al cultivo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas y de abono.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Flores de Yanacona” (The Flowers of Yanacona), which is situated 10 minutes away from the village of Urubamba in the Department of Cusco.

She is 58 years old, single, and has two children (ages 23 and 14). Ana Maria is a farmer who sells what she produces at the vegetable market in Urubamba on Saturdays and Sundays. She wants a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds. Ana Maria will also rent a tractor so that she can prepare her land for a new planting season. In addition, she will also purchase compost that she will eventually apply on her crops. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and compost.

Ana Maria appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loans.name: Zenovia Narcisa

texts.es: La Sra. Zenovia se dedica desde hace 15 años a la comercialización de bazar y librería en uno de los mercados mas concurridos de la ciudad de Santa cruz. Ella empezó trayendo material de librería y repartía a las tiendas, después fue surtiendo con bazar, actualmente tiene su puesto fijo en el mercado donde le va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, también entrega material de escritorio al por mayor,   La familia consta de su hijo y esposo. El crédito que se va ha financiar es para capital de trabajo ya que desea comprar material de escritorio y juegos didácticos para esta época de fin de año. Tiene experiencia en créditos ya  que constantemente saca para capital de trabajo. Fruto de su esfuerzo es que ya cuenta con su casa propia y se siente muy orgullos a de ello,  es una persona muy emprendedora con ganas de superación agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
For the past 15 years, Sra. Zenovia has managed a bazaar and bookstore at one of the most well known bookstores in Santa Cruz.  She started out bringing bookstore materials and distributing them to the stores.  Afterwards, she stocked up on merchandise for her bazaar.  Now she has an established location in the market that is doing well because she has many customers.  Zenovia also sells writing supplies in bulk.  Her family consists of her husband and son.  

The loan she is requesting will be used to finance her operating capital.  She wants to buy writing supplies and educational games for the end of the year.  Zenovia has experience with loans since she is constanting using them for her operating capital.  The results from her efforts include being able to build her own home, of which she is very proud.  Zenovia is an enterprising individual who has the will to succeed.  She thanks Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy writing supplies and educational games.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Luz Marina; tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 4 hijos de21, 17, 12, 11 años de edad;  La socia se dedica  a la agricultura, la socia tiene sus cultivos de maíz y hortalizas, la socia también siembra cebada, todo lo que ella produce lo lleva a vender,  la socia vende en el mercado de Urubamba verduras, ella lleva  a vender los días sábados y domingos, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas, la socia también requiere contrata un tractos y preparar el terreno para la nueva siembra, la socia invertirá también en la compra de abono para luego ponga al cultivo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas y de abono.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Flores de Yanacona” (The Flowers of Yanacona), which is situated 10 minutes away from the village of Urubamba in the Department of Cusco.

She is 38 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has four children (ages 21, 17, 12, and 11). Luz Marina is a farmer who grows corn and vegetables, as well as barley. She sells everything she produces at the vegetable market in Urubamba on Saturdays and Sundays. Luz Marina wants a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of seeds. She will also rent a tractor so that she can prepare her land for a new planting season. In addition, she will also purchase compost that she will eventually apply on her crops. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and compost.

Luz Marina appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loans.name: Marieme

texts.fr: Madame Marieme est une jeune  femme mariée de 21 ans. Elle gère  un local dans un marché de la localité ou elle vit. Elle évolue dans le secteur de la restauration et vend petit déjeuner, déjeuner et diner. Parallèlement  elle commercialise des habits unisexe qu’elle place a ses clients. Elle a choisi son activité de commerce dans le souci de ne pas rester dépendante, mais aussi par amour du métier. Le moment le plus favorables a son activité est  la période  d’été ou son activité lui génère  le maximum de bénéfices.Elle est membre d'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC depuis 11 ans .  Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs  prévu pour l’achat de denrées alimentaires qui lui permettent  de cuisiner les plats qu’elle sert dans son restaurant. L’augmentation de ses revenus l’aide à couvrir ses dépenses personnelles et a assurer les frais de scolarité de sa fille.
texts.en:
Marieme is a young, married woman of 21 years. She is active in the catering industry and runs a restaurant in her local market, where she serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. She also markets and sells unisex clothes to her customers. She started in this line of work to ensure her financial independence, and because of her affinity for retail. She does the most business during the summer months. 
Marieme has been a member of a UIMCEC branch for 11 years and is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs to buy the ingredients needed for the meals she serves in her restaurant. She will use her increased income to cover her personal expenses and the educational expenses of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients for the meals she prepares in her restaurant.

loans.name: Reveca Severiana

texts.es: La Sra. Reveca se dedica desde hace 10 años a la comercialización de juguetes. Ella empezó trayendo juguetes desde la ciudad de La Paz y dejando en los mercados de Santa Cruz al por mayor, actualmente tiene su puesto fijo en el mercado donde le va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, también entrega juguetes al por mayor,   La familia consta de su hijo y esposo. El crédito que se va ha financiar es para capital de trabajo ya que desea comprar juguetes para esta época de fin de año ya que se acercan las fiestas navideñas. Tiene experiencia en créditos ya  que constantemente saca para capital de trabajo, es una persona muy emprendedora con ganas de superación agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Reveca has sold toys for ten years. She started bringing toys from the city of La Paz and selling them wholesale in the markets of Santa Cruz. She now has her own stall in a market. It is going very well for her and she has many customers. She also sells toys wholesale. Her family is made up of her son and her husband. Her loan is for working capital. She wants to buy toys for the end of the year season, since the Christmas holidays are coming up. She has experience with loans because she is always taking them out for working capital. She is a very enterprising person with a desire to get ahead. She is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: to buy toys wholesale.

loans.name: Abajyamugambi Zone 2 Group

texts.fr:
J. fait partie du groupe Abajyamugambi Zone 2 et le chef du groupe c'est celui qui a de l'argent. Le nom du groupe signifie « les initiateurs ». Il a 25 ans et il est célibataire. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

J. est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est la semence du riz sélectionné. Dans les prochaines années, J. voudrait récolter une grande quantité de riz. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’aider ses parents.
texts.en:
J. is a member of the group Abajyamugambi Zone 2. He is also the group leader, as seen in the photo. The group's name means "the initiators". J. is 25 years old and single. He attended six years of primary school.

J. is rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use the funding to buy fertilizer for his rice growing activity.

His business growth strategy revolves around the selected rice seed. In the coming years, J. hopes to produce a large crop of rice and use the profits to help his parents.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his rice farming business

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos tiene 35 años, es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene dos hijos de 6 años y un año y medio. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, junto a su esposa y su madre. Él trabajo al que se dedica es el transporte de pasajeros, servicio que lo realiza dentro de la ciudad. Su trabajo empieza desde muy temprano para salir en busca de pasajeros quienes la mayoría son comerciantes y deben dirigirse a su puesto de venta desde muy temprano. Tiene 9 años en este trabajo y aún desea continuar, ya que gracias a ello, le dio la oportunidad de crecer y darle lo mejor a su familia. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, es que tiene disponibilidad de poder dejar a su hijo en el jardín y recogerlo, además puede realizar otras actividades, como el de acondicionar los espacios de casa, en ellas habitaciones que deja en alquiler. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, y por ello espera la ayuda de cada uno de ustedes para pueda incurisonar en otro trabajo que le gener más rentas. Con éste último crédito podrá comprar pollitos, vacunas, alimentos y materiales para iniciar con la crianza de pollos.
texts.en: Carlos is 35. He is a very hard-working and responsible man. He lives with his wife, with whom he has two children ages 6 and 1. They live together in their own home with his mother. Carlos transports passengers in the city. He starts working very early in order to go find passengers, the majority of whom are merchants whom he drives to their stalls starting very early in the morning. He has done this work for nine years and wants to continue, because this job has given him the opportunity to grow and give his family the best. What he likes about his job is being able to be available to drop off and pick up his child from nursery school, and being able to do other activities, such as doing work on their home. He wants to rent out some rooms. This will be his first loan with MFP, and he hopes for the help of every one of you in order to start a new line of work and generate more income. With this loan he will purchase baby chicks, vaccines, food and materials to start raising chickens.

loans.use: to buy baby chicks, food, and materials for installing a barn.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, tiene la edad 37 de años, está en unión libre y vive con su esposo e hijos. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal y así obtener de el los mejores resultados. Ella cuenta con el terreno apto y en producción y lo que pretende es darle una mejora y así cosechar mayor cantidad de café. Ella quiere generar las mayores ganancias para su bienestar familiar y ayudarle a su esposo con las obligaciones. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gloria, who is 37 years old, is in a common-law marriage and lives with her husband and children. With this loan she plans to buy the supplies to support her coffee plantation and thus obtain better results from it. She has suitable land that is in production and what she wants is to give it some improvements and thus harvest a greater quantity of coffee. She wants to generate better earnings for the well-being of her family and to help her husband with their obligations. This will be the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to improve her coffee plantation

loans.name: Abishyizehamwe / Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Samuel fait partie du groupe Abishyizehamwe / RSZ et sur la photo c'est celui qui a de l'argent. Le nom du groupe signifie « ceux qui sont ensemble ». Il a 42 ans. Il est marié avec 5 enfants de 2 à 25 ans, dont 4 scolarisés. 

Samuel est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est la semence du riz sélectionné. Dans les prochaines années, Samuel voudrait récolter une grande quantité de riz. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Samuel is a member of the Abishyizehamwe / RSZ group.  In the picture, he is the one holding the money.  The name of the group means "those who are together."  He is 42 years old.  He is married and has five children between the ages of two and 25, four of whom attend school.  

Samuel is a rice farmer.  This is his first loan cycle with ACB.  He is going to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers to use in cultivating his rice.
 
His strategy for growing his business is to use only select rice for sowing.  In the coming years, Samuel would like to harvest a large quantity of rice. With his profits, he plans to educate and care for his children.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers to use in cultivating his rice.

loans.name: Glendy Brislid

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Glendy; tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 1 hijo; de 2 años de edad; la socia trabaja en un hostal de turismo, la socia también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como negocio propio, la socia compra gallinas, la socia cría gallinas y aves de corral para la venta a los restaurantes turísticos, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de 40 gallinas tiernas de doble pechuga. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gallinas un total de 40. 
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank, situated 10 minutes from the town of Urubamba, Cusco department.

She is Glendy, 20, single, and she has a 1-year old son.  She works in a tourist hostel and also has her own business of raising small animals.  The member buys hens and raises them and other poultry to sell to tourist restaurants.  She would like the loan to buy 40 double breasted young hens.  She will use the financing to purchase a total of 40 hens.

Glendy appreciates and values the loan offered her and promises to continue making the monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy a total of 40 hens.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.
La socia cristina; tiene 38 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de el menor es de 18 años; La socia se dedica  a la agricultura, la socia se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de papa, maíz, y la socia en esta ocasión desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas de maíz blanco y papa para sembrar y en el tractoreo para preparar la tierra, también comprara el abono para poner luego de sembrar. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de semillas, abono y el pago al tractor.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Las Flores de Yanacona" (The Flowers of Yanacona), located 10 minutes from the town of Urubamba, in the department of Cusco.

She is 38 years old and is married. She has two children, of whom the younger is 18. She works in agriculture. She plants and harvests potatoes and corn. Now she wants a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds for white corn and potatoes to plant and in the tractor to prepare the land. She will also buy fertilizer to put down, then she will plant. She is applying for the loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and fertilizer and the payment for the tractor.

She is thankful for and appreciates the loan that is offered to her, and she promises to continue making her monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of seeds and fertilizer and make the tractor payment.

loans.name: Carmen Amelia

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 57 años es casada y tiene dos hijos que tiene 22 y 28 años, vive con su familia en Cayambe que est+a a una media hora de Otavalo en el norte de Ecuador. Carmen se describe como una persona trabajadora y responsable.

Carmen trabaja con su esposo en la producción de ladrillos, ya son 4 años que solicita créditos a Fodemi, el actual crédito es para la compra de leña para la quema de ladrillos lo cual se hace para que el ladrillo se endurezca y su uso sea el óptimo.

Su sueño es que su negocio de la producción de ladrillos perdure y crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
Carmen is 57 years old.  She is married and has two children who are 22 and 28 years old.  She lives with her family in Cayambe, which is half an hour from Otavalo in the north of Ecuado.  Carmen describes herself as a hard-working and responsible person.

Carmen works with her husband producing bricks, and has been requesting loans from Fodemi for the last four years.  The current loan is for the purchase of firewood for firing the bricks, which is done so that the the brick hardens and becomes optimized for use.

Her dream is for her business to last, and for it to grow more every day.

loans.use: to purchase firewood for her brick kiln.

loans.name: Amado

texts.es: Amado, tiene la edad 65 de años, está casado y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno apto y en muy buenas condiciones por lo cual asistirá su proyecto para aumentar su cosecha y así obtener los mejores resultados. El pretende con el crédito generar las mayores ganancias para su bienestar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a  su esposa. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Amado, aged 65, is married and lives with his wife, who is his biggest priority.  

With the loan, he will buy supplies to help him with his coffee plantation.  He has land that is suitable and in very good condition, which will help in his plan to increase his harvest and so obtain better results.  He plans to generate greater earnings with the loan, which will enhance his well-being and provide his wife with a better quality of life.

This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He had not take other loans previously from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to improve his coffee production.

loans.name: Mykola

texts.ru:
Микола Мажак женат, у нее маленькая 5-месячная дочка. Он работает таксистом и предоставляет транспортные перевозки по Украине.
